txt.en: 'I'm afraid I have already said too much. Please let me be....'
'The Dragons are planning to cut Trum Dreng to pieces for some evil purpose.'
'I don't even know what they want. Surely not these bare lands....'
'The White Hand will make you rue this moment!'
'Begone! I don't have nothing to say to you!'
'Have mercy! I mean you no harm!'
'I'll answer your prying with my fists!'
'Er...ahem...I don't think I was supposed to mention the plan....'
'Please don't tell any of them Dragon Clan folk that I squealed!'
'I'll make you regret pestering me. You'll get no words from me!'
'We dig through the loot and give them Dragons a cut of the findings, on the condition that we keep quiet and stay out of the way.'
'Nosy folk don't do so well in these parts -- especially strangers!'
'You win! What do you want to know? I'll tell you anything! Please don't hurt me.'
'I was not part of the takeover. I only come for the loot because my family starves.'
'It is the Dragon Clan who wages war on Trum Dreng. It is to distr-- ah....'
'It's a chief of the Dragon Clan who hatched this plan, not me. I'm no one but a poor outcast.'
